commentBody: I thought this was all about extorting money from San Diego and Oakland. Not sure about St. Louis. But L.A. has always been there as a way to threaten cities with their loss of their team unless the city built a new stadium. Study Green Bay just to see how slimy the NFL owners really are. No longer can a municipality own a team lest the profit margin of the owners fall to unacceptable levels. Gee how did all this happen?
